languages.text: The character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each Navy officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}. Also, the character gains immunity to the forced movement effects and cannot be overpenetrated.

languages.text: キャラクターは海軍士官の各{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}につき+2の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を得る。また、強制移動効果に対して免疫を得、{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}をされない。
languages.original_text: The character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each Navy officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}. Also, the character gains immunity to the forced movement effects and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetrated{/g}.

languages.text: Der Charakter erhält +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} für jeden vom Offizier der Flotte ausgewählten {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g}. Außerdem erhält der Charakter Immunität gegen erzwungene Bewegungseffekte und kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}überdurchdrungen{/g} werden.

Außerdem erhält der Charakter Immunität gegen erzwungene Bewegungseffekte und kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}überdurchdrungen{/g} werden.

languages.text: Le personnage gagne +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} choisi par l'officier de marine. De plus, le personnage bénéficie d'une immunité aux effets des déplacements forcés et ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétré{/g}.

Also, the character gains immunity to forced movement effects and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetrated{/g}.

De plus, le personnage bénéficie d'une immunité aux effets des déplacements forcés et ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétré{/g}.

languages.text: El personaje gana +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} elegido por el oficial de la Armada. Además, el personaje gana inmunidad a los efectos de movimiento forzado y a la {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g}.

Also, the character gains immunity to forced movement effects and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetrated{/g}.

languages.text: 海军军官每选择一个{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}，此角色就获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。除此之外，此角色免疫一切强制移动效果，且无法被{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}。

Also, the character gains immunity to forced movement effects and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetrated{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 海军军官每选择一个{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}，此角色就获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。除此之外，此角色免疫一切强制移动效果，且无法被{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}。

languages.text: Karakter, Donanma Subayı'nın seçtiği her {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketip{/g} için +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazanır. Ayrıca karakter, zorunlu hareket etkilerine karşı bağışıklık kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}delip geçmeye{/g} maruz kalmaz.
